data.title: CACREP
data.text:
July 2024 Accreditation Decision Announcement

CACREP will now be posting the Board Action Announcement at two points in time. The Accreditation Decision Announcement today contains information on full decision reviews, Progress Reports and any sanctions imposed. The Report Action announcement will be posted by September 12th. Access the Accreditation Decision Announcement here: July 2024 Decision Announcement

Read More

In Memoriam: Art Lloyd

It is with sadness that CACREP reflects on the life of Arthur Lloyd, who passed away earlier this month. Art was a strong supporter of CACREP from the beginning. Idaho State University, where he taught for decades, was among the first institutions to be accredited by the very first CACREP Board – and could have...

ACES Counselor Corner Newsletter

In the July 3rd edition of the ACES Counselor Corner newsletter are updates regarding the CACREP 2024 Standards and the accreditation management system. To view the article, click here. On June 14th, CACREP presented a webinar addressing the 2024 Standards, for ACES. CACREP’s 2024 Standards FAQ page has been updated to address inquiries from this...
